items.sentence: I came here to see if there was something I could do to help, but there doesn\'t seem to be anything for me to do.

Over time, itinerant groups often develop their own language and culture distinct from their settled counterparts.
If the horrors of the abattoir so traumatize the workers, I can't begin to imagine what it's like for the animals.
The reason why many language learners never become fluent is that they talk the walk more than they walk the talk.
